function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inconsistencies in the application of inclusion criteria for study selection","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Selection of studies with cross-sectional or longitudinal methodology","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of specific sub-groups from the study","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on english, spanish, french, italian, or portuguese studies","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases through extensive use of public databases and scientific literature","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Physical and mental health impact of social distancing and home confinement during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate use of search strategies and terminology in the research protocol","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased feelings of loneliness among younger age groups during the covid-19 pandemic leading to symptoms of anxiety and depression.","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adverse psychological outcomes associated with home confinement and social distancing during the pandemic, including emotional disorders, depression, anxiety, stress, irritability, insomnia, ptsd, anger, emotional exhaustion, risky behaviors, and increased substance abuse.","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need to pay attention to and strengthen the public’s mental health to minimize the consequences of loneliness and social isolation due to covid-19.","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to lack of public health measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mental and behavioral disorders due to social distancing and home confinement","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High rates of anxiety and depression during quarantines","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overreliance on digital health practices","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of sustainable integration of digital health practices","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid rollout of digital tools and packages in the medtech sector.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Switch from in-person to remote consultation methods in healthcare.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid navigation of governance and digital integration for digital care processes.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid education of healthcare workforce leading to potential gaps in knowledge and skills","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of digital health solutions for rapid redeployment education","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid development and implementation of new models of care supported by digital health innovation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased interaction and communication through social media platforms can lead to the rapid spread of misinformation about contagious diseases and their prevention.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The cancellation of educational activities, such as conferences and training courses, reduces opportunities for healthcare professionals to learn about new developments in disease prevention, diagnosis, and treatment.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Highly infective disease with a range of symptoms, including respiratory failure or death","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need to triage and treat large numbers of patients with respiratory illness","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need to protect the healthcare workforce to ensure they are able to treat the sick","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cross-border movement of academics and professionals leading to potential spread of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Financial interventions leading to economic instability and inequality","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of timely and accurate information leading to misinformation and panic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited dataset for covid-19 impact on mutual funds","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dynamic and evolving situation of covid-19","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of misrepresentation in financial research","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of the novel coronavirus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dynamic evolution of the pandemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transition from riskier to relatively safer options in investment strategies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transition of funds to utilities, wholesale, and retail firms during the pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cumulative investment decline in germany and france due to coronavirus spread","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Preference of growth firms by equity funds and value investing by fixed income may lead to concentration of investment in specific sectors, increasing the risk of contagion within those sectors.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Concentration of social entrepreneurship funds in services and manufacturing sectors may lead to increased risk of contagion within these sectors.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Significant increase in investments in large firms by equity funds and corporate money market funds during turbulent periods may create concentration risk and increase vulnerability to contagious diseases within specific sectors.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Worsening market conditions impacting fund performance","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative risk-adjusted returns in phase 3 for treasury funds","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transition from positive to negative performance for equity funds in phases 2 and 3","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible contagion of diseases due to close contact in the built environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative impact on health and well-being due to close contact in investment locations","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for disease transmission through shared spaces and surfaces in investment locations","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of sharpe ratio sensitive to market movements","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on var-based models without considering non-normality","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sensitivity of returns to different asset classes and investment strategies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Financial market impact","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
